question: You have heard about plans to build new apartments in a public park near your home. You want to give your opinion about this.Write a letter to the editor of your local newspaper. In your letterExplain how you learnt about these plansSay what you think of the parkGive your opinion on the plans
text: I am writing to bring to your attention a piece of disturbing news that I would like you to publish in your newspaper ‘Qusais Times’. I have heard of plans to erect a new apartment complex on the site of ‘Qusais Park’ from several sources. Firstly, I saw civil engineers taking various measurements inside the park; in addition, the park’s staff members mentioned  this plan when they were queried by me.

The park is of utmost importance to our local community as people go there to play various sports such as soccer, tennis, and basketball. Also, families use it for social activities during the weekends. Therefore, closing the park will affect the local residents as there is no other park within 10 km. distance.

I would like you to publish an article about the drawbacks of this action and express the local community’s great disapproval of the plan. I have also collected the signatures of most of the residents who are against this project.
In the meantime, please do let me know if you need any additional information.
I look forward to seeing your article soon in the newspaper.
